project.name: Magister.js Docs
project.description: A browserside implementation of the Magister 6 API.

params.name: _magisterObj
params.description: A Magister object this Appointment is child of.

params.name: _magisterObj
params.description: A Magister object this Course is child of.

params.name: _magisterObj
params.description: A Magister object this FileFolder is child of.

File.name: File
File.description: A file from Magister, can be downloaded.

params.name: _magisterObj
params.description: A Magister object this File is child of.

params.name: magisterSchool
params.description: A MagisterSchool to logon to.

params.name: username
params.description: The username of the user to login to.

params.name: password
params.description: The password of the user to login to.

params.name: _keepLoggedIn
params.description: Whether or not to keep the user logged in.

params.name: _magisterObj
params.description: A Magister object this Message is child of.

params.name: _magisterObj
params.description: A Magister object this MessageFolder is child of.

params.name: _magisterObj
params.description: A Magister object this Person is child of.

params.name: _type
params.description: The type of the Person.

params.name: _firstName
params.description: The first name of the Person.

params.name: _lastName
params.description: The last name of the Person.

ProfileInfo.name: ProfileInfo
ProfileInfo.description: Information of the logged in user.

params.name: _magisterObj
params.description: A Magister object this ProfileInfo is child of.

params.name: _firstName
params.description: The first name of the user.

params.name: _lastName
params.description: The last name of the user.

params.name: _birthDate
params.description: The date of birth of the user.

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the school.

params.name: url
params.description: The URL of the school.

classitems.description: Gets the classes of this Course.
classitems.name: classes

params.name: callback
params.description: A standard callback.

classitems.description: Gets the grades of this Course.
classitems.name: grades

params.name: download
params.description: Whether or not to download the users from the server.

params.name: callback
params.description: A standard callback.

classitems.description: The rights the current user has on this FileFolder.
classitems.name: rights

classitems.description: The ID of the parent FileFolder of this FileFolder.
classitems.name: parentId

classitems.description: Gets all the files in the current FileFolder.
classitems.name: files

params.name: callback
params.description: A standard callback.

classitems.description: The size of this file in bytes.
classitems.name: size

classitems.description: The rights the current user has on this File.
classitems.name: rights

classitems.description: The FileFolder this File is in.
classitems.name: fileFolder

classitems.description: Downloads the current file
classitems.name: download

params.name: downloadFile
params.description: Whether or not to download the file directly. Only works client-side.

params.name: callback
params.description: A standard callback.

props.name: result
props.description: A string containing the binary data of the downloaded file.

classitems.description: Moves the current File to another FileFolder
classitems.name: move

params.name: fileFolder
params.description: A FileFolder, an ID of a FileFolder or (a part of) the name of a FileFolder.

classitems.description: WARNING. Removes the current File.
classitems.name: remove

classitems.description: Updates the current File on the Magister servers.
classitems.name: _update

classitems.description: Get the appoinments of the current User between the two given Dates.
classitems.name: appointments

params.name: from
params.description: The start date for the Appointments, you won't get appointments from before this date.

params.name: to
params.description: The end date for the Appointments, you won't get appointments from after this date.

params.name: download
params.description: Whether or not to download the users from the server.

params.name: callback
params.description: A standard callback.

classitems.description: Gets the MessageFolders that matches the given query. Or if no query is given, all MessageFolders
classitems.name: messageFolders

params.name: query
params.description: A case insensetive query the MessageFolder need to match.

params.name: callback
params.description: Not useful at all, just here to prevent possible mistakes.

props.name: result
props.description: An array containing the matching MessageFolders.

return.description: An array containing the matching messageFolders.
The inbox of the current user.
The sent items folder of the current user.
The bin of the current user.
The alerts folder of the current user.

classitems.description: Gets the courses of the current User.
classitems.name: courses

params.name: callback
params.description: A standard callback.

classitems.description: Gets an Array of Persons that matches the given profile.
classitems.name: getPersons

params.name: query
params.description: The query the persons must match to (e.g: Surname, Name, ...). Should at least be 3 chars long.

params.name: type
params.description: The type the person must have. If none is given it will search for both Teachers and Pupils.

params.name: callback
params.description: A standard callback.

classitems.description: Fills the given person(s) by downloading the person from Magister and replacing the local instance.
classitems.name: fillPersons

params.name: persons
params.description: A Person or an Array of Persons to fetch more information for.

params.name: callback
params.description: A standard callback.

props.name: result
props.description: An array containing the fetched Persons.

params.name: overwriteType
params.description: The type used to search the persons for. Not recommended for usage.

classitems.description: Shortcut for composing and sending a Message.
classitems.name: composeAndSendMessage

params.name: subject
params.description: The subject of the message

params.name: body
params.description: The body of the message, if none is given the body will be empty.

params.name: recipients
params.description: An array of Persons or Strings the message will be send to.

classitems.description: Gets the FileFolders of the current User.
classitems.name: fileFolders

params.name: callback
params.description: A standard callback.

classitems.description: Returns the profile for the current logged in user.
classitems.name: profileInfo

params.name: callback
params.description: Not useful at all, just here to prevent possible mistakes.

props.name: result
props.description: The profile of the current logged in user.

return.description: The profile of the current logged in user.

classitems.description:
Checks if this Magister instance is done logging in.
You can also provide a callback, which will be called when this instance is done logging in.
classitems.name: ready

params.name: callback
params.description: The callback which will be called if the current instance is done logging in.

return.description: Whether or not the current Magister instance is done logging in.

classitems.description: The MessageFolder this Message in, changing this will move the Message.
classitems.name: messageFolder

classitems.description: Adds (a) recipient(s) to the current Message.
classitems.name: addRecipient

params.name: recipient
params.description: The recipient(s) to add.

params.name: type
params.description: The type of the recipient, if none is provided and recipient is a String it will search for both Teachers and Pupils.

classitems.description: Sends the current Message. Sending will be delayed if there are processes running in the background.
classitems.name: send

classitems.description: Move the current message to the given position.
classitems.name: move

params.name: destination
params.description: The MessageFolder of the ID of a MessageFolder where to move this Message to.

classitems.description: Gets the Messages of this MessageFolder.
classitems.name: messages

params.name: limit
params.description: The limit of the amount of Messages to fetch.

params.name: queries
params.description: Queries to do on the message (e.g: "unread, skip 5")

params.name: download
params.description: Whether or not to download the users from the server.

params.name: callback
params.description: A standard callback.

classitems.description: Gets the MessageFolders in this MessageFolder that matches the given query. Or if no query is given, all MessageFolders
classitems.name: messageFolders

params.name: query
params.description: A case insensetive query the MessageFolder need to match.

params.name: callback
params.description: A standard callback.

props.name: result
props.description: An array containing the matching MessageFolders.

return.description: An array containing the matching messageFolders.

classitems.description: DANGER. Removes ALL messages from the current MessageFolder.
classitems.name: removeAllMessages

classitems.description: Creates a new MessageFolder inside of this MessageFolder with the given name.
classitems.name: createMessageFolder

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the MessageFolder.

params.name: callback
params.description: A standard callback.

classitems.description: DANGER. Removes the current MessageFolder.
classitems.name: remove

classitems.description: The profile picture of the current User.
classitems.name: profilePicture

params.name: width
params.description: The width of the picture.

params.name: height
params.description: The height of the picture.

params.name: crop
params.description: Whether or not to crop the image.

return.description: The URL to the picture, including the given options.

classitems.description: Gets the schools that matches the given query.
classitems.name: getSchools

params.name: query
params.description: The query the school should match to. Should be at least 3 chars long.

params.name: callback
params.description: A standard callback.
